Rare Monster Review (Vol. 3)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Tips: Rare Monster Review (Vol. 3)
By RNA on Friday, April 21, 2000 - 02:54 am:

Just kidding(both kick ass) here are the reviews for the 2 monsters

Durahans-These monsters are truly one of the greatest in mr2 my first one got to master rank her name was Braveheart(I thought she was a girl because she kept asking for perfume and polish)at first they seem to be a monster that seems to be average at every stat I expected good speed,exellent defence,good life,low intteligence,fair power,good skill.What I got was almost the comeplete of my expectations one thing for sure this monster is no speed demon but this cancelled by exellent defence and fairly good intteligence.Its life I wouldnt really call exellent but good and can be raised fairly high,power is godlike and can be very good at skill.Its battles are quite exiting to watch because its moves are very impressive(my personal favorite it functions well defensively in battle and can useually KO an opponent in hit.To all you begginers out there this is possibly the monster that could quickly get you to Master rank.

Centaur-I thought that this was the monster to get me to master rank but it did not live up to my expectations.It is a powerhouse if trained properly with excelent speed,high skill,fair in every thing else the centaur will easily knock out any opponent a purebreed doesnt seem to live long nice subreeds like Antares,and Chariots if trained by an experienced trainer centaurs will go as far as the Legends cup but not a monster for newbeis it takes a lot of experience and patience to raise a good centaur.In battle a centaur is a monster who uses its brains and will wait for the prfect moment to make its move you dotn need high power or high intelligence to do a lot of damage with its moves this is what i like about centaurs.In conclusion Centaurs rock but again in my opinion it can be hard to raise if raised the wrong way.

Well Im off hope somebody will have any profit from this comments and opinions will be greatly appreciated.Eifel 65 sucks and rap totally kicks. Next issue Mocks and Jokers

-- stupid (twopacliveson@hotmail.com), January 29, 2000
